verses.verse: Does not wisdom <S%H2451><s%> cry <S%H7121><s%>? and understanding <S%H8394><s%> put forth <S%H5414><s%> her voice <S%H6963><s%>?
She stands <S%H5324><s%> in the top <S%H7218><s%> of high places <S%H4791><s%>, by the way <S%H1870><s%> in the places <S%H1004><s%> of the paths <S%H5410><s%>.
She cries <S%H7442><s%> at <S%H3027><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%>, at the entry <S%H6310><s%> of the city <S%H7176><s%>, at the coming <S%H3996><s%> in at the doors <S%H6607><s%>.
Unto you <S%H376><s%>, O men, I call <S%H7121><s%>; and my voice <S%H6963><s%> is to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>.
O you simple <S%H6612><s%>, understand <S%H995><s%> wisdom <S%H6195><s%>: and <S%H3684><s%>, you fools, be you of a understanding <S%H995><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%>; for I will speak <S%H1696><s%> of excellent things <S%H5057><s%>; and the opening <S%H4669><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%> shall be right things <S%H4339><s%>.
For my mouth <S%H2441><s%> shall speak <S%H1897><s%> truth <S%H571><s%>; and wickedness <S%H7562><s%> is a abomination <S%H8441><s%> to my lips <S%H8193><s%>.
All the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%> are in righteousness <S%H6664><s%>; there is nothing crooked <S%H6617><s%> or perverse in them <S%H6141><s%>.
They are all plain <S%H5228><s%> to him that understands <S%H995><s%>, and right <S%H3477><s%> to them that find <S%H4672><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%>.
Receive <S%H3947><s%> my instruction <S%H4148><s%>, and not silver <S%H3701><s%>; and knowledge <S%H1847><s%> rather than choice <S%H977><s%> gold <S%H2742><s%>.
For wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than rubies <S%H6443><s%>; and all the things that may be desired <S%H2656><s%> are not to be compared to it <S%H7737><s%>.
I wisdom <S%H2451><s%> live <S%H7931><s%> with prudence <S%H6195><s%>, and find out <S%H4672><s%> knowledge <S%H1847><s%> of witty inventions <S%H4209><s%>.

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is to hate <S%H8130><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>: pride <S%H1344><s%>, and arrogance <S%H1347><s%>, and the evil <S%H7451><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>, and the perverse <S%H8419><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>, do I hate <S%H8130><s%>.
Counsel <S%H6098><s%> is mine <S%H8454><s%>, and sound wisdom: I am understanding <S%H998><s%>; I have strength <S%H1369><s%>.
By me kings <S%H4428><s%> reign <S%H4427><s%>, and princes <S%H7336><s%> decree <S%H2710><s%> justice <S%H6664><s%>.
By me princes <S%H8269><s%> rule <S%H8323><s%>, and nobles <S%H5081><s%>, even all the judges <S%H8199><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
I love <S%H157><s%> them that love <S%H157><s%> me <S%H7836><s%>; and those that seek me early shall find me <S%H4672><s%>.
Riches <S%H6239><s%> and honor <S%H3519><s%> are with me <S%H6276><s%>; Yes, durable riches <S%H1952><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.
My fruit <S%H6529><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than gold <S%H2742><s%>, Yes <S%H6337><s%>, than fine gold; and my revenue <S%H8393><s%> than choice <S%H977><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%>.
I lead <S%H1980><s%> in the way <S%H734><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the paths <S%H5410><s%> of judgment <S%H4941><s%>:
That I may cause those that love <S%H157><s%> me to inherit <S%H5157><s%> substance <S%H3426><s%>; and I will fill <S%H4390><s%> their treasures <S%H214><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> possessed <S%H7069><s%> me in the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of his way <S%H1870><s%>, before <S%H6924><s%> his works of old <S%H4659><s%>.
I was set up <S%H5258><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%>, from the beginning <S%H7218><s%>, or ever <S%H6924><s%> the earth was <S%H776><s%>.
When there were no depths <S%H8415><s%>, I was brought forth <S%H2342><s%>; when there were no fountains <S%H4599><s%> abounding <S%H3513><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>.
Before the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were settled <S%H2883><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the hills <S%H1389><s%> was I brought forth <S%H2342><s%>:
While as yet he had not made <S%H6213><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, nor the fields <S%H2351><s%>, nor the highest part <S%H7218><s%> of the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%>.
When he prepared <S%H3559><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, I was there <S%H2710><s%>: when he set a circle <S%H2329><s%> upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the depth <S%H8415><s%>:
When he established <S%H553><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>: when he strengthened <S%H5810><s%> the fountains <S%H5869><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%>:

When he gave <S%H7760><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%> his decree <S%H2706><s%>, that the waters <S%H4325><s%> should not pass <S%H5674><s%> his commandment <S%H6310><s%>: when he appointed <S%H2710><s%> the foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>:

Then I was by him <S%H681><s%>, as one brought up <S%H525><s%> with him <S%H3117><s%>: and I was daily his delight <S%H8191><s%>, rejoicing <S%H7832><s%> always <S%H6256><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%>;
Rejoicing <S%H7832><s%> in the habitable part <S%H8398><s%> of his earth <S%H776><s%>; and my delights <S%H8191><s%> were with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.
Now therefore listen <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, O you sons: for blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that keep <S%H8104><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> instruction <S%H4148><s%>, and be wise <S%H2449><s%>, and refuse it not <S%H6544><s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> that hears <S%H8085><s%> me <S%H8245><s%>, watching daily <S%H3117><s%> at my gates <S%H1817><s%>, waiting <S%H8104><s%> at the posts <S%H4201><s%> of my doors <S%H6607><s%>.
For whoever finds <S%H4672><s%> me finds <S%H4672><s%> life <S%H2416><s%>, and shall obtain <S%H6329><s%> favor <S%H7522><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
But he that sins <S%H2398><s%> against me wrongs <S%H2554><s%> his own soul <S%H5315><s%>: all they that hate <S%H8130><s%> me love <S%H157><s%> death <S%H4194><s%>.
